name: Box Battles (itch)
description:
Box Battles is a 2D local multiplayer arcade game. The objective is to destroy your opponent before he does the same to you!

The game requires two twin stick controllers to play.

Controls:
    Move: Left analog stick
   Jump: Left shoulder button or 'A'
    Aim: Right analog stick
    Shoot: Right shoulder button

    Quit: Escape

Each player can have only one shot active at any time. The only way for you to get a new one is to either hit the enemy with it, reducing his health, or safely grab it yourself. 

May the best box win!
